Additional Scope Comments: All Forest Service email in all agency email accounts will be managed using GRS 6.1 items 010 and 011.  The agency will not be using item 012.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure.
Legacy Email Scope: Agency will be applying GRS 6.1, items 010 and 011 to all legacy email dating back to 2011, as available.  It may not be possible to differentiated between accounts of senior agency officials and other agency employees.  If this is the case, then GRS 6.1, item 011 will be applied to the legacy email.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: Senior agency official organization chart attached (September 2015)

Additional Scope Comments: We are not separately categorizing email created by administrative and support staff.  Their email will be retained for 7 years, per item 011.Cut-off instructions for 010:  Cut-off at the end of the administration.  Retain 15 years, then transfer to the National Archives in a compliant format.
Legacy Email Scope: The Department of Education will be including legacy email for all items being used, dating back to approximately January 2009.
